title: Sense and sensibility
creator_credit: Mirage Enterprises, Columbia Pictures, Lindsay Doran and Ang Lee
brief_description: Ang Lee directs this well scripted, acted and beautifully photographed version of Jane Austen’s first novel. Emma Thompson, (who wrote the screenplay), and Kate Winslet are Elinor and Marianne. Elinor uses her head and Marianne is guided by her heart. Both sisters eventually find love but only after the usual complications. A star-studded cast including Hugh Grant and Alan Rickman.
